author: Iain Meldrum
description: Dry and slightly on the bitter side of bittersweet, single malt scotch, gentian liqueur and dry vermouth sit well together in this appealing aperitif-style cocktail.
name: The Dandy (by Iain Meldrum)
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Speyside single malt Scotch whisky
30 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
3 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
